name: The Godfather
storyline: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: JOAN DIDION

name: White Heat
storyline: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

name: Eddie Murphy: RAW
storyline: Eddie Murphy in a stand-up performance recorded live. For an hour and a half he talks about his favourite subjects: sex and women.
